entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
